name: newaccount.selfregister
subject: [%CONFSHORTNAME%] New account
body:
Greetings,

We received a request to create an account for you on the %CONFNAME% submission site. If you made this request, please use this link to set a password:

%PASSWORDLINK%

If you did not make this request, it’s safe to ignore this email.

The link will work for 3 days. Should it expire, obtain a new link using "Forgot my password".

* Site: %URL%/
* Email: %EMAIL%

If you already have an account under a different email address, you may merge this new account into that one. Go to your profile page and select "Merge with another account".

Contact %ADMIN% with any questions or concerns.
